odooDeplacements.title: Travel Management (Odoo)
odooDeplacements.description: Complete Odoo module to manage employee travel requests and missions. Hierarchical approval workflow (Manager → CFO), automatic expense calculations, logistics management (cities, vehicles, transportation), email notifications and assigned activities.

gestionStock.title: Stock & Supplier Management
gestionStock.description: PHP/MySQL web application to manage products and suppliers. Features: add, edit and delete products, stock history, display products at double threshold, supplier details. Modern interface with XSS security.

dataWarehouse.title: Data Warehouse - Banking Analysis
dataWarehouse.description: Building a data warehouse with PostgreSQL to analyze customer reviews of bank branches in Morocco. Implementation of ETL processes with DBT and use of Google Maps API to extract geolocated data.

medicalPlatform.title: Medical Analysis Platform
medicalPlatform.description: Real-time medical records analysis platform with Spring Boot, Hibernate and MySQL. Integration of Kafka for automatic alerts and WebSocket for real-time notifications.

timeSeriesAnalysis.title: Time Series Analysis Tool
timeSeriesAnalysis.description: Comprehensive time series analysis tool using Python. Implements ARIMA and SARIMA models with stationarity tests (ADF, KPSS), AIC/BIC optimization criteria, and Ljung-Box residual diagnostics. Interactive visualizations powered by Plotly.

personalInfo.name: Ahmed Raji
personalInfo.title: Data & Software Engineering Student
personalInfo.bio: Final-year Data & Software Engineering student at INSEA. Passionate about backend development (Java/Spring Boot, Node.js, Python), software testing (unit, integration, REST API validation), ERP integration (Odoo, SAP), and building Data Pipelines (ETL, data processing). I focus on code quality, backend service reliability, and CI/CD automation. Currently seeking a 4-6 months internship in software development, ERP, or Data Engineering.

backend.title: Backend Developer
backend.description: Development and maintenance of a web platform with Node.js and Express.js. Implementation of automated tests, development of new features (online payments, dashboards), and CI/CD configuration with GitHub Actions. MongoDB optimization and backend performance improvement.

dataIA.title: Data/AI Intern
dataIA.description: Development of a 3D preprocessing pipeline (NIfTI) configurable via YAML. Training and evaluation of a UNet 3D model with PyTorch. Code optimization and dataset structuring to improve reproducibility.

insea.description: Data and Software Engineering - Training in software development, data analysis, artificial intelligence and systems engineering.

fst.description: Mathematics, Computer Science & Physics - Honors (Mention Très Bien). Fundamental training in science and computer science.
